Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In comparing the performances of the two polymer devices , the higher J sc for the PEBDTPD device was attributed to its better nanoscale phase separation , smoother surface , and higher carrier mobility in the polymer : PC 70 BM blend films.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| PEBDTPD device |
| PC 70 BM blend films |

In comparing the performances of the **PEBDTPD device** and the other polymer device, the higher J sc for the PEBDTPD device was attributed to its better nanoscale phase separation, smoother surface, and **higher carrier mobility in the PC 70 BM blend films**.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| PEBDTPD device |
| PC 70 BM blend films |

In comparing the performances of the **PEBDTPD device** and another polymer device, the higher J sc of the PEBDTPD device was attributed to its better nanoscale phase separation, smoother surface, and **higher carrier mobility in the PC 70 BM blend films**.

(Note: J sc stands for "junction scattering", a physical property, but it is mentioned in relation to the performance of the PEBDTPD device and the PC 70 BM blend films, which are material entities.)
